nodes.text: The Geniseria system was a star system located in the Jurzan sector of the galactic regions known as the Expansion Region and the Trailing Sectors. It was home to the creatures known as Geniserian sand monkeys.
The Geniseria system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square M-15.
